abstract: Billionaire Carl Icahn has disposed of more than 7 million shares of Guaranty Financial Group, the bankrupt Texas bank whose assets were seized two months ago and sold to Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria.
snippet: Billionaire Carl Icahn has disposed of more than 7 million shares of Guaranty Financial Group, the bankrupt Texas bank whose assets were seized two months ago and sold to Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn has disposed of more than 7 million shares of Guaranty Financial Group, the bankrupt Texas bank whose assets were seized two months ago and sold to Banco Bilbao Vizcaya Argentaria SA.

headline.main: Icahn Unloads Stake in Guaranty Financial
